abstract: Fashion insiders complain about the often overlapping dates for New York, Milan and Paris Fashion Weeks, which make it virtually impossible to attend all three; some wonder if it would be better to cancel one of the fashion weeks, or reschedule them so that they form one cohesive fall fashion season.
snippet: If editors had to choose which show to attend next September, could New York, London and Milan all survive?
lead_paragraph: If editors had to choose which show to attend next September, could New York, London and Milan all survive?

headline.seo: Fashion Weeks May Overlap — Front Row
